ORDER
PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 933
M. Bernard MORGAN, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
